typeDescription.name: Sentence
typeDescription.description: Annotates the boundaries of a sentence from the input text.

typeDescription.name: Question
typeDescription.description: Annotates the single question Sentence in the input.

typeDescription.name: Answer
typeDescription.description: Annotates answer Sentences in the input.

featureDescription.name: correct
featureDescription.description: whether the answer is a correct answer to the question

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: a number between 0 and 1 representing how well the Answer matches its associated Question.

typeDescription.name: Token
typeDescription.description: Annotates each token span in each Sentence by tokenizing their strings.

typeDescription.name: NGram
typeDescription.description: Annotates sequences of tokens in a Sentence

typeDescription.name: OneGram
typeDescription.description: Type of NGram for holdings sequences of 1 token.

typeDescription.name: TwoGram
typeDescription.description: Type of NGram for holdings sequences of 2 tokens.

typeDescription.name: ThreeGram
typeDescription.description: Type of NGram for holdings sequences of 3 tokens.

typeDescription.name: Evaluation
typeDescription.description: Ranks Answers by score and measures performance.

featureDescription.name: n
featureDescription.description: The number of correct answers in the input.
